Maki uses her cloth for defensive means by wrapping it around her and any nearby allies, she can form a protective barrier. The cloth can be made around a nearby object such as a rock, to better hold down the fortification. If the cloth is made wet by a [[Water Release]] technique, it allows the dome to defend against powerful [[Scorch Release: Great Steaming Explosive Blast|heat-based attacks]].
